item.title: Trucksmap USA v1.1b ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 15, 2025

Trucksmap USA v1.1b ATS

Currently adds: a secret road heading south on Interstate 5 near Bakersfield and Mojave – Take Interstate 5 for Passenger Cars and Buses.

Mod compatibility:
This mod is compatible with any mod that does not modify Interstate 5 near Bakersfield, Mojave, Oxnard and Los Angeles, such as ProMods Canada.
For mods modifying this area please place this mod above them.
Or to be safe you can just chuck this mod above all map mods if you would prefer.

Added map area for lay-by in Jackpot, Nevada
Added secret road running alongside 140 Nevada, above Winnemucca.

Credits: Stoppable Trucking

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Enhanced SCS Cargo v1.1 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 15, 2025

Enhanced SCS Cargo v1.1 ETS2

This mod add or subtract certain cargo to certain trailers, read more below:
All cargo in this mod are vanilla SCS + DLC, no custom cargoes or changes to pickup/delivery companies are made.

Refrigirator:
Reefer trailers is now able to haul all food products as well as a selected group of non-food products, making the use of reefers much more versataille.

Curtainsider:
Curtainsiders is now able to haul majority of general low value non-food cargo, including some cargo that was previously reserved for flatbed and sidewall trailers, making the use of curtains much more versataille.

Bulk:
Silo trailers is now able to also haul sugar and flour. Woodshavings is removed from silos, you can find these cargos with walking-floor/dumper trailers instead.

Dryvans/Walking-floor:
Dryvans has added more walking-floor specific cargoes, but because dryvans span across “walking-floor” trailers and “regular” trailers with sidewalls, player must make a choice themself if it is realistic to haul such cargo that is presented.
This is a compromise made to allow for actual use of walking-floor trailer by adding cargo to the pool that in real life is loaded onto “walking-floor”, but not a “regular” dryvan.
Quickjobs/Freightmarket will sometimes spawn trailer paired with unrealistic cargo, the only con of this mod.
Ammunitions, fireworks and explosives are now only aviable with a dryvan.

Foodtanker:
Milk is now limited to a range of maximum 300km from pickup location.

Insulated:
Medical Vaccines is removed from insulated trailers, you can find this cargo with the refrigerator trailer instead.

[NEW in v1.1]Flatbeds:
Flatbeds are now able to haul selected group of cargo on regular flatbed and flatbed w./sidewalls, among those are machinery, construction equipment and other highvalue items making the flatbeds much more versataille.

New cargo added:
[Added]Yoghurt: increased mass
[Added]Oranges: increased mass, increased fragility.
[Added]Terrain Forklifts: added sidewall flatbed, increased mass.
[Added]Watertank: added curtainsider + sidewall flatbed, increased mass.
[Added]Bricks: added flatbed
[Added]Tractors: added flatbed, decreased volume
[Added]Forklifts: added flatbed + sidewall flatbed, decreased volume.
[Added]Grapes: increased mass.
[Added]Frozen Octopi: increased mass.
[Added]Frozen Hake: increased mass.
[Added]High pressuretank: added sidewall flatbed.
[Added]Luxury Yacht: removed lowbed
[Added]Marbleslabs: added sidewall flatbed
[Added]Metalbeams: added sidewall flatbed
[Added]Plasticpipes: added sidewall flatbed
[Added]Concrete beam: added sidewall flatbed
[Added][ADR]Ammonia: increased mass.
[Added][ADR]Arsenic: increased mass.
[Added][ADR]Chemicals: increased mass.
[Added][ADR]Chlorine: increased mass.
[Added][ADR]Hydrochlorine: increased mass.
[Added][ADR]LPG: increased mass.
[Added][ADR]Sod.chlorine: increased mass.
[Added]Foodoil: increased mass.

Changes to excisting cargo:
Olive oil: removed curtainsider + insulated, added refrigerator, increased mass
Peanutbutter: increased mass.
Medical Equipment: increased mass.
Young Seedlings: increased mass.
Milk(reefer): increased fragility
Sandwichpanels: increased mass.
Woodbeams: added sidewall flatbed.
Large tubes: added sidewall flatbed.
Empty pallets: added max. distance 800km
Used plastic: added max. distance 800km, increased mass.
Used packaging: added max. distance 800km, increased mass.
Strawbales: added sidewall flatbed.
Seed bigbags: added flatbed, increased mass.
Aluminum ingots: added sidewall flatbed, increased mass.
Trainpart 1+2: added sidewall flatbed.
Squaretubing: added sidewall flatbed.

New DLC cargo added:
[DLC HighPower][Added]Aircondition units: added curtainsider + flatbed
[DLC JCB][Added]Compact Generators: added sidewall flatbed + curtainside
[DLC JCB][Added]Mini Excavator: added sidewall flatbed + curtainside
[DLC JCB][Added]Powerpacks: added sidewall flatbed + curtainside
[DLC JCB][Added]Dumpster: added sidewall flatbed.
[DLC JCB][Added]Fasttrack: added flatbed.
[DLC Farm Machinery][Added]Autonomous tractor: added sidewall flatbed + flatbed
[DLC Farm Machinery][Added]Discharrow: added flatbed + sidewall flatbed, decreased volume.

Credits: VirtualTruckTravels

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Vistabus Dd v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 15, 2025

Vistabus Dd v1.0 ETS2

– Fix Bug Visual Interior Mirror
– Fix Bug Some Texture Parts
– Fix Bug Anim Interior
– Interior Addition and Anim Variant SG
– Addition Of Anim Scania On Variant 6×2 & 4×2
– Horn Cabin Customization
– Engine Sound Repair and Transmission
– Engine Addition and Sound 1521
– Slow Engine Repair and Transmission
– Color Changes Main Lamp
– Color Changes High Beam Lamps
– Changing Lights Parking
